title: Fiora q/passive and r
body:
can you make it so her q will hit enemy vital not the minion next to them

and the r doesn't proc if you hit all 4 points, and if you hit more than 1 and the enemy dies it wont proc either

replies.body: no it was directly at their vital, but there is like a 20 hp minion standing next to the vital and it will hit that instead, and ik its in her q range, because strait after it kills the minions she then aa the vital and it procs, meaning that it just decided to attack the minion over the vital

> [{quoted}](name=deviousDT,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=2IpPT3ry,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-07T13:56:56.426+0000)
>
> her q priorities vital points over dying minions, if you were going to miss the hit from her Q you are probably at a bad angle causing it to hit a minion

Probably misjudged the range

Fiora's Q does hit vitals if the enemy is in range and youre actually lunging so you hit said vitals, if that doesnt happen then chances are you missed them by a whisker, and as for ult so far its working perfectly for me.

well for me, it wont activate 1/2 the time, if I pop 3/4 of the vitals before the enemy dies I don't get it either, and sometimes after popping 1 of the vitals it doesn't pop, so I end up having 1/2 of my ult lost, making it harder to do anything for the team, sustain wise
